meaning_str.bing:
n. 【网】网站
网络. 网站建设；网站网址；网页

网站建设；网站网址；网页

网站；（Website）网站（全球资讯网的主机站）

1.en: Now an independent website is offering to pay anyone who drops a certain amount of weight over the course of a year.
1.cn: 现在又出现了一个独立的网站，任何在一年内减掉一定体重的人都可以从该网站获得报酬。

2.en: There's no such thing as a user reading a website manual or otherwise spending much time trying to figure out an interface.
2.cn: 没有这样的东西的网站用户阅读手册或其他花费时间试图找出一个接口。

3.en: It pledges that the whereabouts of every cent from sponsors can be traced on its official website.
3.cn: 它保证，资助人的每一分捐款都可从网上追踪；

0.en: Which stands for? No one seems to know. O.T.P.S. has no office, no website.
0.cn: 做什么？似乎无人知晓，OTPS没办公室，没网站。

1.en: Yesterday morning, Osman Ahmed posted to an Islamist website that he's going to change the world.
1.cn: 昨天上午，奥斯曼·艾哈迈德在一个伊斯兰网站发布了消息说他要去改变世界。

2.en: Six months ago, Robert recognized Margot on a live blogging website. He'd liked her since grade school.
2.cn: 六个月前，罗伯特在一个直播网站上发现了玛戈他从小学就开始喜欢她了。

3.en: And the credit-card company. Phil made a large purchase on a Tibetan website called CopingCandles.Com.
3.cn: 还有信用卡公司说，菲尔在一家名为“应对困难蜡烛网”的西藏网站上进行了大采购。

4.en: We have to go this month, because next months it gets so hot, you'll burst into flames. I bet that's not on their website.
4.cn: 我们得这个月去，下个月就太热了，会烤焦的。我打赌网站上可没写这个。

5.en: You really think the people are gonna disturb your family at this tragic time? That people are gonna post condolences on a website?
5.cn: 你认为大家会想要在这悲伤的时刻打扰你的家人吗？有人会在网站上张贴哀悼辞吗？

6.en: Are you someone that has been persuading men to become HeForShes and collecting their signatures for our website? How many have you got?
6.cn: 你是不是试图说服男人们成为并收集他们在我们网站上签名的一员？你收集到了多少呢？

7.en: This philosophy is key to Facebook. It may seem like a simple website. But it's really a completely new type of product.
7.cn: 而这个理念就是脸书的关键所在。 它可能看起来只是一个简单的网站，但却是一种完全新型的产品，也要承担很多责任。

8.en: Lorrie, if this goes badly, my career as a safety expert will end as a website and a business card. I'm more worried about your career as a pilot.
8.cn: 洛丽，如果情况急转直下，我作为安全专家的事业，会连同网站和生意一同消失。我更在乎的是你机长的事业。

9.en: For this recipe and others in the series, you can visit the BBC Food website.
9.cn: 这个食谱以及在节目中的其他的，你可以访问BBC 食物的网页。

10.en: There were no responses. Nobody posted anything on the website, nobody called my parents, so the joke my friend is on you.
10.cn: 根本就没有人回应。没有人张贴任何东西，没有人打电话给我父母，你才好笑。
